description:
This is a General English course for non-native English speakers. This course will help you develop skills to communicate independently and become more fluent in English , the course covers real world topics such as free time, jobs, careers, world news, traveling and entertainment. By the end of this course you'll master the following topics:

  1. Making introductions using the verb to be.
  2. Using possessives to talk about yourself and others.
  3. Talking about your past using the past tense. Practice forming statements using “to be” and various regular and irregular English verbs.
  4. Describing the kind of people you like to hang around with.
  5. Describing friends and family in English.
title: English as a Foreign Language
